verses.verse: He that is wounded in the <S%H6481>stones,<s%> <S%H1795><s%> or hath his privy <S%H8212>member<s%> cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

A <S%H4464>bastard<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> to his <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall he <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

An <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> or <S%H4125>Moabite<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> to their <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall they <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5704>forever:<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

Because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834>they<s%> <S%H6923>met<s%> you <S%H3808>not<s%> with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and with <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> when ye came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt;<s%> <S%H4714><s%> and <S%H834>because<s%> they <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> of <S%H4480>Pethor<s%> <S%H6604><s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia,<s%> to <S%H7043>curse<s%> thee.

Nevertheless the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam;<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7045>curse<s%> into a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> unto thee, <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> thee.
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> their <S%H7965>peace<s%> nor their <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8581>abhor<s%> an <S%H130>Edomite;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is thy <S%H251>brother:<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8581>abhor<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thou <S%H1961>wast<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in his <S%H776>land.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H3205>begotten<s%> of them shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in their <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> then keep <S%H8104>thee<s%> from <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H1961>be<s%> among you any <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> by reason of uncleanness that <S%H4480>chanceth<s%> <S%H7137><s%> him by <S%H3915>night,<s%> then shall he go <S%H3318>abroad<s%> out <S%H413>of<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>within<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the camp: <S%H4264><s%>

But it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> when <S%H6153>evening<s%> cometh <S%H6437>on,<s%> he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> himself with <S%H4325>water:<s%> and when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>down,<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> again.
Thou shalt <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H3027>place<s%> also <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H8033>whither<s%> thou shalt go <S%H3318>forth<s%> abroad: <S%H2351><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H3489>paddle<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H240>weapon;<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> when thou wilt <S%H3427>ease<s%> thyself <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> thou shalt <S%H2658>dig<s%> therewith, and shalt turn <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H853><s%> that which <S%H6627>cometh<s%> from thee:

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thy <S%H4264>camp,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee, and to give <S%H5414>up<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; therefore shall thy <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy:<s%> that he <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6172>unclean<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> in thee, and turn <S%H7725>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H310><s%> thee.

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5462>deliver<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H113>master<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5337>escaped<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee:

He shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, even <S%H7130>among<s%> you, in that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of thy <S%H8179>gates,<s%> where it liketh him <S%H2896>best:<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3238>oppress<s%> him.

There shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6948>whore<s%> of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> a <S%H6945>sodomite<s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H868>hire<s%> of a <S%H2181>whore,<s%> or the <S%H4242>price<s%> of a <S%H3611>dog,<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5088>vow:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> these are <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> lend upon <S%H5391>usury<s%> to thy <S%H251>brother;<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> of <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> of <S%H400>victuals,<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is lent upon usury: <S%H5391><s%>

Unto a <S%H5237>stranger<s%> thou mayest lend upon <S%H5391>usury;<s%> but unto thy <S%H251>brother<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> lend upon <S%H5391>usury:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee in <S%H3605>all<s%> that thou <S%H4916>settest<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H935>goest<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

When <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H309>slack<s%> to <S%H7999>pay<s%> it: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will surely <S%H1875>require<s%> <S%H1875><s%> it <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5973><s%> thee; and it would <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> in thee.
But <S%H3588>if<s%> thou shalt <S%H2308>forbear<s%> to <S%H5087>vow,<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> in thee.

That which is gone <S%H4161>out<s%> of thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> thou shalt <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H6213>perform;<s%> even a freewill <S%H5071>offering,<s%> according <S%H834>as<s%> thou hast <S%H5087>vowed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> with thy <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H935>comest<s%> into thy <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> then thou mayest <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%> thy <S%H7648>fill<s%> at thine own <S%H5315>pleasure;<s%> but thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> any <S%H413>in<s%> thy <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H935>comest<s%> into the standing <S%H7054>corn<s%> of thy <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> then thou mayest <S%H6998>pluck<s%> the <S%H4425>ears<s%> with thine <S%H3027>hand;<s%> but thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5130>move<s%> a <S%H2770>sickle<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> standing <S%H7054>corn.<s%>
